alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 7:48AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Accomack and Northampton Counties through 830 AM EDT... At 747 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Cheriton, or near Cape Charles, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Nassawadox around 825 AM EDT. Exmore and Willis Wharf around 830 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Capeville, Birdsnest, Kiptopeke State Park, Jamesville, Silver Beach, Eastville, Machipongo, Wardtown, Franktown and Simpkins. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
